Detailed Description

vp9 svc parameters

This defines parameters for svc encoding.

Field Documentation

unsigned int vpx_svc_parameters::width

width of current spatial layer

unsigned int vpx_svc_parameters::height

height of current spatial layer

int vpx_svc_parameters::layer

current layer number - 0 = base

int vpx_svc_parameters::flags

encode frame flags

int vpx_svc_parameters::max_quantizer

max quantizer for current layer

int vpx_svc_parameters::min_quantizer

min quantizer for current layer

int vpx_svc_parameters::distance_from_i_frame

frame number within current gop

int vpx_svc_parameters::lst_fb_idx

last frame frame buffer index

int vpx_svc_parameters::gld_fb_idx

golden frame frame buffer index

int vpx_svc_parameters::alt_fb_idx
